title: WHATS WRONG WITH LEAVEBUSTER?
body: So, I AFK one match because electricity was gone, so when it just came back, I went to the game and I saw 20Min Wait time, I thought ''OK''. So, I left it happen in the background and I was doing my work in the browser, So, After 20 Mins I again shifted to the launcher and saw that I was automatically returned to the Home/Main Menu, I clicked on play once again, I again gave me a wait time of 20 Min, I was like seriously, I waited 20 Mins, Didn't even play a game and again, I happened like 2 or 3 times, Please Help Guys.. Not able to play a single game because of it. Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
It sounds like this is happening because of an *unstable connection* to our matchmaking servers, which would prevent you from reaching champ select reliably. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this isn't caused by any network settings on your local end.

If you encounter further issues with this after taking those steps, let me know.

Because Riot is filled with a bunch of autistic liberal retards that have no idea what they are doing. This game has got progressively worse over the last year. Ever since Ghostcrawler join the team. The guy is bad.
I hope they fix this, . Yes, this is true that the game is worse than the last year, and who is ghostcrawler btw?
Dev that came from world of warcraft.  Guess he got tired of screwing that game up.
